sqlMap.select: SELECT D.MNG_YEAR ,D.MNG_NO ,D.MNG_SEQ ,D.REGIST_SEQ ,R.ENTRPS_CD ,(SELECT E.ENTRPS_NM FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F E WHERE E.ENTRPSCD = R.ENTRPS_CD) ENTRPS_NM ,(SELECT SUBSTR(E.BIZRNO, 0,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(E.BIZRNO, 4,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(E.BIZRNO, 6,5) FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F E WHERE E.ENTRPSCD = ENTRPS_CD) BIZRNO ,TO_CHAR(R.CTRT_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CTRT_BEGIN_DT ,TO_CHAR(R.CTRT_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CTRT_END_DT ,NVL(R.GR_RENT_AR, 0) GR_RENT_AR ,R.BOUND_CD ,R.PAY_SE ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM062', R.BOUND_CD) BOUND_NM ,G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC ,G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM ,G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB ,D.ASSETS_NM ,NVL(D.RENT_AR, 0) RENT_AR ,DECODE(D.RENT_AR_SE, '1', '물류부지', '2', '제조부지', '3', '숙성실', '') RENT_AR_SE_NM ,D.APPLC_RNTFEE ,D.PRICE_SE ,DECODE(D.PRICE_SE, '1', '면적당단가', '2', '월단가','') PRICE_SE_NM ,NVL(D.ASE_RNTFEE, 0) ASE_RNTFEE ,TO_CHAR(D.DETAIL_PD_BEGIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DETAIL_PD_BEGIN ,TO_CHAR(D.DETAIL_PD_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DETAIL_PD_END ,TO_CHAR(D.ASE_APPLC_BEGIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ASE_APPLC_BEGIN ,TO_CHAR(D.ASE_APPLC_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ASE_APPLC_END ,D.APPLC_RSN ,DECODE(R.TERMN_DT, NULL, 'N', 'Y') TERMN_YN FROM (SELECT A.* FROM HTLD_RENT_DETAIL_HIST_F A WHERE A.HIST_SEQ = GAM_GET_HTLD_RENT_HIST_SEQ(A.MNG_YEAR, A.MNG_NO, A.MNG_SEQ, #histDt#)) D LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT B.* FROM HTLD_RENT_HIST_F B WHERE B.HIST_SEQ = GAM_GET_HTLD_RENT_HIST_SEQ(B.MNG_YEAR, B.MNG_NO, B.MNG_SEQ, #histDt#)) R ON D.MNG_YEAR = R.MNG_YEAR AND D.MNG_NO = R.MNG_NO AND D.MNG_SEQ = R.MNG_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G ON D.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND D.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND D.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD wHERE D.MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND D.MNG_NO = #mngNo# AND D.MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND D.REGIST_SEQ = #registSeq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE HTLD_RENT_DETAIL_F SET ASE_RNTFEE = TO_NUMBER(#aseRntfee#) ,ASE_APPLC_BEGIN = TO_DATE(#aseApplcBegin#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,ASE_APPLC_END = TO_DATE(#aseApplcEnd#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,APPLC_RSN = #applicRsn# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND MNG_NO = #mngNo# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REGIST_SEQ = #registSeq#
sqlMap.select: SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(RNTFEE_SEQ),0) + 1,'3','0') FROM HTLD_RNTFEE_F WHERE MNG_YEAR=#mngYear# AND MNG_NO=#mngNo# AND MNG_SEQ=#mngSeq#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO HTLD_RNTFEE_F ( MNG_YEAR ,MNG_NO ,MNG_SEQ ,RNTFEE_SEQ ,RENT_DETAIL_REGIST_SEQ ,RNTFEE_SE ,RNTFEE_SE_NM ,NTIC_BEGIN_DT ,NTIC_END_DT ,APPLC_BEGIN_DT ,APPLC_END_DT ,APPLC_RNTFEE ,RNTFEE ,PAYINST_INTR ,SUP_AMT ,VAT ,PAY_AMT ,RM ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ) VALUES ( #mngYear# ,#mngNo# ,#mngSeq# ,#rntfeeSeq# ,#rentDetailRegistSeq# ,'1' ,'실적평가 정산분' ,TO_DATE(#nticBeginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_DATE(#nticEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_DATE(#applcBeginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_DATE(#applcEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,TO_NUMBER(#applcRntfee#) ,TO_NUMBER(#rntfee#) ,0 ,0 ,0 ,0 ,#rm# ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM HTLD_RNTFEE_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND MNG_NO = #mngNo# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND RENT_DETAIL_REGIST_SEQ = #rentDetailRegistSeq# AND RNTFEE_SE = '1' AND NTIC_BEGIN_DT = TO_DATE(#nticBeginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND NTIC_END_DT = TO_DATE(#nticEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
